name: The apple's way (BlueRake)
description:
Description

A puzzle-based game where the objective is to retrieve the Legendary apple that was stolen.

------------------------------------------

Features

• An indie game where you will need to solve some puzzles.

• Soundtrack and Characters made by us.

Controls

• Move - WASD / Arrow Keys

• Interact - "Z"

• Quest Menu - Start Button("Enter")

------------------------------------------

We created the character models for GB Studio and used the tileset from this

Website: https://rekkimaru.itch.io/gb-studio-dungeon-tileset-8x8

------------------------------------------

Credits
